pgrid.core.maintenance.identity
Interface MaintenancePolicy

All Known Implementing Classes:
CoFPolicy, CoUPolicy, NoMaintenancePolicy
public interface MaintenancePolicy

This interface represent the minimum to implement in order to be responsible for the maintenance protocol of P-Grid

Author:
Renault John

          Unique name of the protocol
 boolean handleUpdate(DataItem item)
          This method handle the update of a data item.

getProtocolName

String getProtocolName()
Unique name of the protocol

Returns:
the name

stale

boolean stale(PGridHost host)
This method should be called when a host is stale. Some decision may be taken depending on the maintenance policy.

Parameters:
host - stale host
Returns:
true if the routing table has been updated

handleUpdate

boolean handleUpdate(DataItem item)
This method handle the update of a data item.

Returns:
true if the update took place
